uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize

Class AbstractSynthesizeModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.module.AbstractModule
      • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.AbstractSynthesizeModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SynthesizeModule, SynthesizeWordModule

    public abstract class AbstractSynthesizeModule
extends AbstractModule
implements Module
    Base class for different modules provide net synthesis.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter, vsp

      • getCategories

        public Category[] getCategories()
        Description copied from interface: Module
        Returns the categories the module belongs to. The categories are used to improve the module overview making particular modules faster to find. If null is returned the module is automatically assigned to the default category.
        Specified by:
        getCategories in interface Module
        Overrides:
        getCategories in class AbstractModule
        Returns:
        an array of categories

      • getSolvedEventStateSeparationProblems

        public static java.lang.String getSolvedEventStateSeparationProblems(TransitionSystem ts,
                                                                     java.util.Collection<Region> regions)
        Get a string representation that describes for each region which Event/State Separation Problems it solves.
        Parameters:
        ts - The transition system that should be solved.
        regions - The regions that solve (part of) the transition system.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the solved problems.
